Description:
Private Inspections Available
A Rare Opportunity to Secure Two Units On One Title!
Presenting two units upon a spacious 842m2 (approx.) block, this is the ultimate investment opportunity! Whether you plan to lease both homes, or to live in one while you lease the other, this is an opening not to be missed. This property also offers an ideal set-up for those with family members who enjoy their independence but still need to be close to the primary caregivers.
Positioned in a quiet pocket of Leopold, this location places you within walking distance to public transport and the Leopold Sportsmans Club. The Highland Milk Bar is also a short stroll away, along with access to the Bellarine Rail Trail. A short drive will place you at the Leopold P.S and Gateway Plaza - putting the practical elements in place for families of all ages!
Set upon such a large block, both units are positioned to maximise privacy. Both floorplans consist of a generous living/dining/kitchen zone, three bedrooms with built-in robes, bathroom, separate toilet, and a laundry with external access. The kitchens take care of all your cooking needs with a built-in pantry and cooking appliances (oven, gas hob, rangehood).
In the front unit, a split-system air conditioner and ceiling fans provide modern comfort. The secure backyard will delight with gorgeous gardens and a veggie/herb patch. The small alfresco features a café blind to protect from the elements - meaning you can enjoy this beautiful outdoor setting all year long. The remote single lock-up garage provides secure parking.
The rear unit features a split-system air conditioner, gas wall heater, and a ceiling fan. The sheltered alfresco puts the foundations in place for casual outdoor living while flowing onto the generous yard. Caravan owners will instantly see the appeal in creating vehicle access to the grassy yard! The remote single lock-up garage provides secure parking.
Rarely does an opening like this arise in the property market! Youll need to act quickly to secure this unique opportunity!

Description:
Country Charm On The Coastal Fringe
Available for private inspection. Please contact the listing agents to arrange your private viewing
The Feel:
Established gums cradle the winding driveway of this beautiful 3.7 acre semi-rural property, invoking a warm welcome and an instant sense of calm. You are immediately drawn to the peaceful surrounds, imagining your children or grandchildren running free while enjoying an organic lifestyle privileged to only a few. The dream starts here - prioritise inspection.
The Facts:
-Quality, original ODowd built 4BR family home
-Complete north aspect with rural outlooks
-OP kitchen, living and dining overlooking patio
-Stone benchtops, Neff and c appliances
-Fully enclosed outdoor room with Velux skylights
-Huge rumpus room enjoys southern rural views
-Study with custom joinery and external access
-Generous master suite with dressing room and ensuite
-Guest room with WIR and ensuite bathroom also
-Additional 2BRs share the main bathroom
-Well equipped laundry with ample storage cupboards
-Clever design allows for passive solar benefits
-Oversized DLUG with internal entry and storage
-4 bay shed with power and secure fenced surrounds
-3 x rain tanks connected to the home, town water avail.
-Ducted heating, R/C air conditioning and gas log fire
-Productive olive, lemon, lime and plum trees in fruit
-3.7 acres (approx.) of beautiful, private open space
-Minutes from pristine beaches and all town facilities
-Public transport close by for city commuters
-The perfect retreat for your family and hobby farmers
The Owner Loves.
The Peaceful open space while still being closely connected to the community and facilities.
Amazing natural light, cross ventilation and northerly aspect to living zones.
Great entertaining for family gatherings, small and large groups inside and out.
Segregated, bedrooms and bathrooms for extended family and guests.

Description:
Outstanding Potential
Occupying a generous corner allotment of 609sqm (approx.) in a quiet pocket of an ever-growing suburb. This quaint home presents incredible value and a timely opportunity for first homebuyers wanting to put their own stamp on something or those in search of a property to redevelop (STCA).
The traditional floor plan starts with the formal lounge as you enter with direct access to the private patio. Step through from here to the central kitchen and large family meals area, filled with natural light.
Completing the home is three well-sized bedrooms, all serviced by the functional main bathroom. In addition a separate bungalow to be used as you so desire.
Well located, you will find yourself only a short drive to both the Geelong CBD and Bellarine Peninsula and only moments from all the action of the Leopold Shopping Centre that will cater to all you daily needs.
Features include:
DLUG
Single carport
Gas heater

Description:
Tranquil Court Location
Positioned in a quiet and convenient court location within walking distance to Dorothy Street shopping strip, Allanvale Pre School, public transport and health services.
This immaculate home provides convenient living in a brilliant location. Set amongst delightful gardens and occupying a large allotment of 840m2 (approx.). This beautiful residence is ready and waiting for new owners to call it home.
Offering three generous sized bedrooms, two posing built in robes. The central bathroom has been tastefully updated showcasing fresh white tiles, a quality frameless shower recess, new vanity and bath.
Take your pick of two separate living zones, you can enjoy the main dining & living space, spacious and light filled with a cozy gas fire place, reverse cycle split system air conditioner and lovely bay window overlooking a leafy garden. While the family room located towards the back of the home enjoys the pleasant views back to Geelong and towards Corio Bay which are particularly stunning at night. French doors between the two living areas can be opened up to provide a very large open plan living room for entertaining with the entire family or be closed off for privacy & relaxing.
The contemporary kitchen features ample laminated cupboards and loads of bench space, stainless steel Bosch appliances, dishwasher and glass splash back.
Outdoors is just as impressive, there is no limit of space, with a large, private yard offering an impressive balcony perfect for entertaining, garden shed for extra storage, expansive paved outdoor living area complete with big built in bench seat and firepit. Car accommodation is provided in the large, remote controlled single garage.
Set in a beautiful court you have the sense of private living with the convenience of the central location only an easy walk to the Leopold primary school and facilities. Come and see this gem for yourself!

Description:
Tranquil Woodville!
Without a moment of doubt this executive residence announces itself as one of the finest in the local property market! Stylish, sophisticated and showcasing an inclusions list of the highest calibre it is a must see for prospective purchasers who demand uncompromising excellence! A fine example of a contemporary open plan design is complemented by highly desirable lifestyle features delivering the ultimate 'sea change' experience!
Beautifully appointed 3 bedroom home; the luxurious master suite is complete with ensuite and walk in robe. A bespoke study design sits seamlessly within the free flowing floor plan
The primary living zone consists of an open plan kitchen/family/dining zone, it is bathed in an abundance of natural light; wonderful use of expansive windows creates a lovely inside/outside connection to the gently cascading landscaped gardens
The kitchen is 'top shelf' in every sense; sleek contemporary straight lines work seamlessly with earthy textures and tones. Expansive dual stone benchtops, custom cabinetry, pendant lighting, stainless steel appliances and one of the cleverest butler's pantry designs you will come across.
This fine residence will excite 'the entertainer' within; a beautifully appointed decked alfresco is complete with Coonara wood heater, custom café blinds and ceiling fan ensuring it provides a wonderful living area for all four seasons
All the modern comforts including gas ducted heating, plantation shutters and ceiling fans.; An impressive inclusions list and key liveability features ensure this home is winning the efficiency stakes (solar panels etc)
A prime land holding of 613m2 (approx) is beautifully landscaped with an emphasis on low maintenance; established fruit trees, raised garden beds, established turf all complement the tranquillity of a truly eye catching pool setting (push button and user friendly).
The A+++ location simply cannot be overstated; positioned right in the heart of a boutique pocket of Drysdale. Surrounded by impressive quality homes and perfectly placed to have all of Drysdales amenities at arms reach (schools, medical services, fully equipped retail sector and a vibrant cafe/restaurant scene. The Bellarine Peninsula is a thriving market place; award winning wine labels, beautiful parkland's, excellent boating and fishing prospects and the panoramic views of the bay.
Internal area
162m²

Description:
Magic On Mirrabooka!
The Openn Negotiation has started (auction held online that allows flexible terms for qualified buyers). The property can sell at any time. Contact Lee Martin on 0400 957 839 or Ange Callan-Harris on 0423 295 705 immediately to become qualified and avoid missing out.
The Feel:
Presenting with an immediate warmth and charm identified with the feeling of home, this 3 bedroom property has been beautifully renovated for immediate enjoyment. Separate living and sleeping zones mean ease of living is prioritised, with seamless flow to the impressive gardens and open space of the rear yard; complete with in-ground swimming pool.
The Facts:
-Tasteful, quality renovation completed throughout
-Multiple NF living areas with You Yang and Bay views
-Classic timber kitchen overlooking beautiful gardens
-Seamless integration with the outdoor alfresco zone
-Solar heated swimming pool and surrounding deck
-Picturesque and privatised gardens across 1171m2 (approx)
-Sitting room with flexibility as a study/home office
-Separately placed master with WIR and stunning ensuite
-2 further BRs share the main bath with dual vanities
-Open fireplace, ducted heating and R/C air conditioning
-Freshly painted, timber floors and plenty of charm
-DLUG with rear roller access, extra parking for boats/trailers
-A fantastic floorplan for families or a luxurious holiday home
- maintained and ready to be enjoyed
-Placed for convenience to all town assets and practicalities
-A short distance to award winning wineries and eateries
The Owner Loves.
The amount of space and privacy we have here allows us to fully relax and make the most of being at home. This floorplan has been perfect as a growing family and the location convenient, yet quiet in the busier months.

Description:
Private Inspections Available
Spacious Living, Ample Vehicle Storage & A Superb Location!
Set upon approx. 660m2, this property will astound with spacious living zones, a north-facing backyard, and side vehicle access for caravans and boats!
With the Gateway Plaza and other local amenities only a short stroll from your front door, a blissful lifestyle is yours to keep. Whether youre picking up some groceries, enjoying a touch of retail therapy, or meeting a friend for lunch, the Gateway Plaza will leave you wanting nothing. The local sporting grounds and Bellarine Rail Trail will inspire the whole family to keep active, while the Leopold Primary School and Leopold Community Centre put the practical elements in place for families. Public transport is an instant away, while a short drive will find you in the vibrant heart of Geelong or the Bellarine Peninsula.
An abundance of natural light sweeps through the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone, which opens onto the sheltered alfresco deck for seamless open-air living. Whether youre enjoying a lazy weekend at home or youre entertaining family and friends, this space will effortlessly accommodate. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a walk-in pantry and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, gas cooktop, canopy rangehood, Bosch oven). Pendant lights highlight the island bench, which doubles as a breakfast bar. The lounge offers immense versatility as a kids play space or even a large study.
Zoned to the rear of the home, the Master Bedroom is awash in northern light. The walk-in robe features built-in shelving, while the en suite is graced with a shower, single vanity and toilet. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes, main bathroom, separate toilet, and laundry with external access complete the functional layout. Modcons include ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner, ceiling fans, and video intercom.
The backyard creates a wealth of space for children and pets alike. The playground will steal the hearts of little ones, while the veggie/herb gardens and fruit trees invite you to enjoy fresh produce straight from the source. Two garden sheds provide ample storage. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, while the entire west side of the property offers room for storing caravans, trailers, or boats. Tradies will also see the appeal in constructing a work shed (STCA).
With every element in place for a superb family lifestyle, youll need to act swiftly to avoid disappointment! Inspect without delay!

Address: 55-57 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
A PRIVATE & SPACIOUS OASIS
Upon entering this beautiful home you are greeted by a spacious grand formal living room with beautiful bay window overlooking lovely landscaped gardens. The home further features 3 bedrooms including Master with lovely french doors, double WIR & ensuite, family room, a fantastic home office/study plus functional kitchen & dining area which flows out to a brilliant outdoor space perfect for entertaining! Outside further enjoys a handyman's workshop & generous car accommodation. Set on a generous 1171m2 allotment with fully fenced lush gardens, this fabulous family home is a private oasis perfect for those who desire space with ample room the boat or caravan. This is the perfect opportunity to enjoy seaside living with the Clifton Springs Boat ramp, Golf and Bowls Club all a short distance away plus local shops and amenities all in close proximity. This wonderful home is warm & inviting and truly one not to be missed!

Description:
A Home With A Heart!
Boasting a spacious layout, north-facing bay views, and a gorgeous backyard with swimming pool, this home puts the elements in place for terrific family living!
An effortless lifestyle is yours to keep with public transport and the Bellarine Rail Trail only a short stroll away. The Leopold Sportsmans Club is also within walking distance for a great meal with friends. Families will appreciate easy access to Leopold Primary School, Leopold Community Hub, and the Leopold Library. The Gateway Plaza is nearby for all of your essentials, while the Portarlington Highway grants easy access to both Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula.
As soon as you step inside, youll love the sense of flow and openness this home creates. Leadlight windows grace the double door entrance, while a raked ceiling oozes character and makes a statement of the winding staircase and upper level.
The front lounge inspires relaxation while flowing through to the formal dining area. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone creates a wealth of space for everyday living and overlooks the tranquil backyard. Tassie Oak floorboards grace the living area, while the study nook is a welcome addition.
The kitchen exudes elegance with stone benchtops, walk-in pantry, and quality stainless steel appliances (Miele dishwasher, SMEG 900mm oven/gas hob, Qasair rangehood). The office, bathroom, and large laundry complete the lower level.
Upstairs, the Master Bedroom is graced with a private balcony that captures views over the sparkling bay waters and You Yangs. The walk-in robe leads to the en suite, which features a single vanity, shower, and toilet. Four additional large bedrooms with built-in robes (one with window seat) share close access to the powder room and main bathroom with spa bath.
Modcons include ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner, and ducted vacuum.
Established trees create a wonderful sense of privacy in the backyard, which is home to an enticing salt-water pool. Featuring a rock waterfall, this pool will set the scene for many fun-filled summers to come! Both the alfresco and pergola invite you to kick back and relax in this beautiful outdoor setting.
The remote lock-up garage provides secure parking for four vehicles, while also featuring internal access.
With so much to offer, this home is the perfect place to raise a family! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Quality family home in great location.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Deane on 0407 926 659.
Please check our Head Office guidelines below before meeting with one of our agents or before viewing a property by appointment.
Visit: https://www.barryplant.com.au/cms/document/view/118/COVID-19_Online_Information_v2.pdf for more information.
Situated in a family friendly location, this well-appointed family home is sure to appeal to those who are searching for space, privacy, and a family friendly floorplan. Comprising 4 bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms, 3 living areas and a large back yard, this property certainly is sure to appeal to first homeowners, investors and all in between.
The expansive, open plan kitchen, living and dining area is kept cosy in winter by a charming wood heater, offers ample space for a large family, and opens out to a beautiful alfresco area perfect for yea-round entertainment. The kitchen features a gas cooktop, dishwasher, premium Bosch double oven and plentiful storage. There is a second, separate living area that is perfect for a teenagers retreat or kids playroom. To the front of the home is a small living area/sitting room, that could be utilised as a home office.
Outside there is plenty of greenery, a veggie garden for the green thumbs out there, and is both private and secure for those with children and pets.
Features include:
- Ducted Heating.
- Double lockup garage.
- Potential side access.
- Off street parking for up to 5 vehicles.
This property is located within a short walk to the local park and the beautiful Bellarine Rail Trail, just 5 minutes drive to Leopold's Gateway Plaza, 15 minutes to the Geelong Waterfront, 10 minutes to the Bellarine Peninsula, and with easy access to some of Geelong's finest schools, this property offers a great blend of space, convenience, value for money. Enquire today!
To book your private inspection please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.

Description:
Nest or Invest and Benefit
Here is one for the astute first home buyer or investor. Solid, well positioned and recently refurbished, it will be appreciated by anyone who appreciates easy living in a convenient location.
With many features on offer, the fully renovated kitchen is a highlight. It features a crisp white finish with new appliances, and plentiful work and storage space. The adjacent dining and living area are spacious and light filled and a second separate living zone is a welcome bonus. Solid timber floors add character and the neutral decor is a blank canvas to showcase your own personal style.
There are four bedrooms, all with built in robes and cosy carpets, and there is also an ultra contemporary bathroom with designer inspired touches. A conveniently located laundry with a large linen press is also included.
The 467m² corner allotment is fully fenced and outdoor living can be enjoyed in the private and sheltered garden area; or make the most of all weather entertaining on the enclosed patio. A lock up garage offers secure storage and parking.
Located opposite the Ash Road shops, with kindergarten and primary school nearby, this is certainly a handy spot. Leopold is fast becoming recognised as an ideal location with Geelong just a short commute away and easy access to the world class beaches of the Bellarine. With all the hard work done, simply snap this one up and start reaping the rewards.

Description:
Isolate in style
To arrange a private inspection please contact the agent.
This stunning property situated minutes from Geelong,enjoys a private lake side setting and superb lifestyle position.
The main residence combines classic elements and a modern floorplan whilst taking full advantage of its million-dollar views and surrounds. Featuring two main suites with walk in robes and ensuites and a further two generous bedrooms with access to the central bathroom. The kitchen has been extremely well renovated and boasts walk in pantry and quality appliances. Three generous living areas have access to the extensive decking and private garden.
The coach house comprises a self-contained two-bedroom apartment above the triple garage perfect for extended family, home office or potential for business.
Sited on 5 acres with uninterrupted views, extensive shedding, integrated fully fenced paddocks, horse stable, landscaped and manicured gardens and an inclusion list beyond reproach. Located within easy access to private and public schools, Gateway shopping plaza, beaches, wineries and the best the Bellerine has to offer.
For further information or to arrange an inspection please contact the agent.
For more information on this property text '5-7 Avenue' to 0428 444 841

Description:
Everything On Your Doorstep
This large three-bedroom home is sure to impress! Situated on approximately 586m2, ideally located just a short stroll from the expanding Gateway Plaza, Leopold sporting ovals, Bellarine rail trail and Leopold Primary School. This much-loved family home is ready for its new owners to walk straight in and enjoy.
The flexible floor plan includes three generous bedrooms, the master comprising private ensuite and walk in robe, while the remaining bedrooms offer built in robes and are serviced by the central family bathroom.
The two separate living areas provides plenty of room for the whole family to enjoy. From the large formal sitting room located at the front of the home through to the open plan kitchen, dining & family room at the hub of the home. The stylish kitchen offers ample bench space, quality stainless steel appliances, dishwasher & step-in pantry.
Outdoors is just as impressive and offers something for everyone. With a large undercover alfresco area perfect for year-round entertaining, as well as the expansive & secure rear yard with space for the children to play.
Additional extras include double remote garage with rear roller door access, central heating and evaporative cooling, automatic watering system, including 2 x 5000L water tanks and pump, high 2.7m ceilings and a beautiful street scape.
With easy access to public transport and only a short drive to some of the Bellarine's best beaches, wineries & easy access to the Geelong CBD. An Inspection is highly recommended and will not disappoint.

Description:
UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY WITH RURAL LAND (OVER 8 ACRES) JUST 10 MINUTES TO GEELONG
Phone enquiries - please quote property ID 23729
A rare opportunity to purchase 8.36 acres (approximately) of land zoned Rural Living (RLZ) situated just 10 minutes drive from the Geelong CBD.
Endless opportunity to simply enjoy the land and build your forever family home or a retirement option for those lifestyle seekers searching for the luxury of space so close to the Geelong CBD.
The property is fully fenced and has a private driveway (approximate 130m x 10m). Perfect opportunity to create an amazing tree lined property entrance.
Local primary school around the corner and other schools just minutes away. The property has easy access to both Port Arlington Road and Bellarine Highway. Bellarine Village shopping centre and Leopold Gateway Plaza are just 5 minutes away.
For those who a looking for a nest egg this property could have subdivision possibilities in the future (STCA)

Description:
Renovated, Refreshed, Ready
New to the market is this fully-renovated, solid brick house in Clifton Springs that is packed with pleasant surprises. Refreshed from the front to the back, the multiple living options on offer will appeal to those on the hunt for space.
Cleverly divided into three clear zones with a parents escape at the front with the master, en suite, walk-in robe and formal lounge.
The hub of the home is at the centre with an open-plan and spacious living and dining room. The modern kitchen boasts soft-close cabinetry, self-cleaning wall oven, five-burner stove top, stone bench, dishwasher and corner pantry.
On the other side of the hallway door is the childrens wing with three double bedrooms with built-in robes and a multi-purpose area that leads to outside. Set it up as a playroom, study, home office or teenagers retreat. From here the kids can easily spill out to the backyard for uninterrupted play.
Additional features include double lock-up garage with through access, large outdoor undercover entertaining spot with a wood fire, ceiling fans, new carpet, air-conditioner, water tank, 20 solar panels with 5 kilowatt converter, two garden sheds, fruit trees and raised vegetable beds.
Located within close proximity to the local shopping centre, parks, schools and easy access to the highway into Geelong and Melbourne. Clifton Springs Golf Club and water are only 500 metres away and it is a two minute drive to the heart of Drysdale.

Description:
Laidback Family Living With Generous Backyard!
Boasting two living zones and a generous backyard, this home puts the elements in place for laidback family living!
Positioned within walking distance to Bellrise Park Estates sporting grounds and playground facilities, every member of the family will be inspired to venture outdoors. Lake Connewarre is moments away for weekend adventures, while a short drive will find you at the Gateway Sanctuary or Gateway Plaza. Public transport is also a short stroll from your front door, while Leopold Kindergarten and the Leopold Community Centre are conveniently close by.
Northern light sweeps through the generous front lounge, which can be sectioned off from the main living zone via double doors perfect for children or teens who enjoy their own space. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone provides the lively hub of the home while opening onto the sheltered alfresco via a glass stacker door. This indoor-outdoor flow is ideal for both everyday living and entertaining loved ones! The kitchen is well equipped with a built-in pantry, breakfast bar, and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas cooktop, and canopy rangehood).
Positioned at the rear of the home, the peaceful Master Bedroom features a walk-in robe and en suite with shower, dual vanity, and toilet. Two additional bedrooms with mirrored built-in robes, main bathroom, separate toilet, and laundry with storage complete the layout. Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, and ceiling fans provide modern comfort. The generous and secure backyard makes this an ideal choice for families parents will love sitting under the shade of the alfresco as they watch the little ones run and play! The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, along with built-in shelving.

Description:
Contemporary Living In A Superb Locale!
Dont miss this opportunity to embrace blissful living in Leopold! Showcasing contemporary interiors and a north-facing backyard, youll need to act swiftly to avoid disappointment!
With the local sporting grounds positioned directly opposite, this home comes hand-in-hand with a carefree lifestyle. Public transport is an instant from your front door, while the local playground and BBQ facilities are within close walking distance. Families will appreciate easy access to Leopold P.S, while the expansive Gateway Plaza provides you with an abundance of shopping and dining options.
The interiors exude an airy ambience with white walls and wide vinyl plank flooring. Natural light sweeps through the open plan living zone, which unites with the north-facing alfresco for seamless open-air living. Built-in cabinetry to the living zone adds to the contemporary feel, while also functioning as an entertainment unit. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a built-in pantry and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, oven, gas hob, canopy rangehood). The island bench conveniently doubles as a breakfast bar for casual dining.
Overlooking the front garden, the Master Bedroom will delight with plantation shutters, a walk-in robe, and en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom, separate toilet, and laundry. Ducted heating and remote-controlled ceiling fans keep you comfortable all year long, while the roof also features a ventilation fan. With the sheltered alfresco deck boasting café blinds, you can either soak up the sunshine or protect yourself from the suns rays. Low-maintenance gardens line the backyard, which creates a secure play space for children and pets alike. The 2100L rainwater tank helps to keep your gardens in tip-top condition. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access.
If youve been dreaming of a carefree lifestyle, then look no further! Inspect without delay!

Description:
Sensational Starter, Ideal Investment!
With enviable garden outlooks from most windows and Bay glimpses, this neat as a pin abode located in an elevated pocket of Clifton Springs will impress! Perfect as is or scope to update and personalise, this will tick all the boxes for first home buying, downsizing or savvy investing.
Feeling like home from the moment you walk in, you're welcomed by the warmth of timber floorboards and spacious open planned living with the lounge, dining and fully equipped kitchen. 3 large bedrooms all with built-in-robes are positioned from the rear hallway and are serviced by a central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. The picture is perfectly complete with established and manicured gardens boasting an array of flowers and plants, veggie patches, outdoor undercover area and more than enough space for multiple cars, boats and all the toys.
Additional features of the home include - double carport with further secure rear access, tinted windows, heating and cooling, surround sound speakers, alarm system, 2 x garden sheds and water tank.
Walking distance to the Bay, public transport, Golf Club, shops, pre and primary schools, with the remainder of the booming Bellarine at your fingertips - This will not last long!

Description:
Cherished Home With Backyard Vehicle Access!
Perfectly positioned within walking distance to Gateway Plaza, this home presents an irresistible choice for first homebuyers, downsizers, and investors alike!
With everything you could need only a short walk away, you can leave the car at home and enjoy the fresh air. The Rolling Pin Bakery is close by for a bite to eat, while the Gateway Sanctuary and local sporting grounds inspire outdoor fun. Public transport is moments away, along with the Leopold Primary School and Leopold Community Hub.
Occupying a corner block that boasts vehicle access to the north-facing backyard, this property comes with a whole lot of perks! Inside, the original interiors are in spotless condition. The formal lounge/dining zone overlooks the front garden, while the open plan living/meals/kitchen zone is perfect for casual living. The updated kitchen boasts a built-in pantry, breakfast bar, and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, oven, gas hob, rangehood).
The Master Bedroom features a walk-in robe and en suite with shower, single vanity, and toilet. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom, while the separate toilet and laundry complete the layout. Two gas wall heaters, a split-system air conditioner, and ceiling fans keep you comfortable in all seasons.
Complete with café blinds that open onto the backyard, the sunroom provides a peaceful spot to relax no matter the weather. The secure backyard wraps around the north and eastern sides of the home - creating a generous outdoor area for young children or pets. The garden shed provides ample storage. The double carport with a gate offers parking, while side access leads to a tall carport for caravan or boat storage. When it comes to easy living in a convenience-plus locale, home has it all! Youll need to act swiftly to avoid disappointment!

Address: 49 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
The Coastal Lifestyle
Overlooking the Golf Course and immaculately presented, this spacious family home offers excellent value for the discerning buyer. Only minutes to the boat ramps and close to all amenities, you'll love being only a short walk to the Clifton Springs waterfront.
Spacious 'L' shaped lounge/dining features wood heater.
Original kitchen with dishwasher overlooks meals/family area
Three large bedrooms with robes and a study/fourth bedroom
Master bedroom with en-suite. Updated family bathroom
Gas ducted heating and reverse cycle cooling
Huge undercover alfresco area opens to a good size rear yard
Large garage with workshop and a carport for extra parking
Established low maintenance gardens
Ideal investment property or holiday abode
Easy access to the bowls club, golf course, and boat ramps
Insights: 49 Bay Shore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
